title: Everyone's a Critic

en: You turn in your solution to one of Dominique's many, many doubts and nitpicks, and he comes back with a problem to the solution you found. Heat surges through you. Would it kill him to just say, "Good job" every once in a while?

yes_caption: Ask him for some positive feedback instead

en: You attempt to ask for some positive feedback, but it comes out as passive-aggressive and bitter. You know it's a bad look, but he should have been a bit more gentle.
You grudgingly do the work of placating his concerns, and send it back to him. Your message was a bit gruff, but it's nothing he can't handle.
